|brand = UniElec |model = U7621-06 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 256M/16M |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/13/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/UniElec_U7621-06 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless embedded board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12805D; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 7C:3E:9D
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;v4.0;Breed; |stockos = Linux;3.14.48;PandoraBox v14;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, mSATA, SIM Card slot, TF Card slot, |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SIM Card slot, TF Card slot, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, PandoraBox, Padavan (unofficially),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2017 |estprice = 42 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/10/13/unielec-u7621-06-MediaTek-mt7621-router-supports-openwrt-padavan-and-pandorabox-firmware/ On CNXSoftware] :Notes use of [https://breed.hackpascal.net/ Breed bootloader] :2x Mini PCIe, 1x Mini PCIe/mSATA (USB 2.0), 1x SATA 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 ports *[https://www.aliexpress.com/item/MTK-MT7621-Enterprise-Router-Firewall-Gateway-LTE-4G-WIFI-PCBA-ODM-OEM-U7621-06/32819923460.html On AliExpress] :Notes RAM as variable (256 MiB standard, 512 MiB upgraded) :States OpenWrt, Padavan, and PandoraBox support, though, possibly unofficial? :The price of the unit ranged from 41.90 (bare) to 124.80 USD (enclosed with MT7615 modules) *[https://patchwork.ozlabs.org/patch/834235/ Patch to LEDE adding support w/ commentary (mailing list)] :MAC address duplication - 7c:3e:9d:1d:7a:2c *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=842593 On 4pda forums] (bootlog)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/unielec/unielec_u7621-06_256m_16m |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/unielec/u7621-06 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here

*[[UniElec U7981-01-AX]] • AX3000 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router • [https://www.unielecinc.com/product/ax3000-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-6-router_u7981-01-ax/ PPage] *[[UniElec U7986-06]] • AX6000 Wi-Fi 6 Router with a 2.5G port • [https://www.unielecinc.com/product/ax6000-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-6-router_u7986-06/ PPage] :[[MediaTek]] MT7986A/MT7975N/MT7975PN/MT7531AE/MxL GPY211 *[[UniElec U8071-01]] • AX3000 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router with two 10G SFP ports • [https://www.unielecinc.com/product/ax3000-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-6-router-with-two-10g-sfp-ports_u8071-01/ PPage] *[[UniElec U8071-20]] • AX3000 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router w/ Sim 5G/4G Module • [https://www.unielecinc.com/product/ax3000-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-6-router-with-one-sim-5g-4g-module_u8071-20/ PPage] *[[UniElec U8072-01]] • AX3600 Dual Band Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router with two 10G SFP ports • [https://www.unielecinc.com/product/ax3600-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-6-router-with-two-10g-sfp-ports_u8072-01/ PPage]
